Entries.default:
"Good, you are here. Clario has made good on his promise. We are making ready to free your ship."

Ikawha gestures toward your vessel, where a motley group of Huana and Vailian workers race to and fro.

"I say still that you are fortunate. The ship was nearly lost. But it will float. 

"For how long, I cannot say. You will wish to find a friendly port with some speed, I think."
"Come. We will see your Defiant out to sea."

"Get moving, you lot! And you there! Keep an eye on the supports!"

With a final surly shake of the fist, the woman turns toward you.

"Well, on you get. There's a dinghy over there with your name on it."

"We'll have the Defiant out to meet you quick as we're able."
"This would all be a damn sight easier with that Huana priestess' spells, but... We'll have to make do without, won't we?"
"Ah, there you are. We're getting underway, as you can see. Slowly."

"So you will go to the great Kahanga city as well? You must sail north for some time, and then a little east.

"Take care in Neketaka, outsider. It will close its jaws around you, and you will never notice."
